meanings.definition: A small mass of cells capable of developing into a new individual in certain lower animals.
meanings.sent1: The gemmules in the sponge can grow into new sponges.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how gemmules in some animals can create new life.
meanings.sent3: The gemmules in the jellyfish decided to have a party and multiply.
meanings.sent4: The gemmules in the sea star hold the secret to regeneration.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the gemmules look like tiny building blocks of life.

meanings.definition: A small gem or other object of value, especially when cut and polished for ornament.
meanings.sent1: She wore a necklace adorned with beautiful gemmules.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler carefully crafted the gemmules into a stunning ring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the gemmules and hid them in its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like gemmules in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with glittering gemmules of all colors.
